        Your task:

img_summary: The image depicts an intricately carved wooden tablet, likely representing a significant artifact or item in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the surrounding text, this item is the "Celestial Registry Tablet," classified as an Epic rarity. Its in-game effect slightly increases the experience points gained from defeating enemies. It is found in "The Webbed Hollow" at Purple Cloud Mountain, inside a small gazebo in the initial opening area.
